subject: Sports Injuries
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
lead_paragraph: The broad power that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell has in ruling on player discipline could come into question if the players in the Saints bounty program test their suspensions in court.
snippet: The broad power that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell has in ruling on player discipline could come into question if the players in the Saints bounty program test their suspensions in court.
